    • Method Detail

      • equals

        public static boolean equals(byte[] b1,
             byte[] b2)
        Test, if two byte arrays are equal (i.e. same length, same values). In contrast to equals on byte array objects, the content is compared, not the references. Thus, this function can be used to store byte arrays into HashMaps.

      • hashCode

        public static int hashCode(byte[] b)
        Computes a hashCode of a byte arrays. In contrast to hashCode on byte array objects, the content is used, not the references. Thus, this function can be used to store byte arrays into HashMaps.
